{"id":454249107,"lang":"java","time":"1Â year","timestamp":1612923046,"status_display":"Runtime Error","runtime":"N/A","url":"/submissions/detail/454249107/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Valid Word Abbreviation","memory":"N/A","code":"class Solution {\n    public boolean validWordAbbreviation(String word, String abbr) {\n        if (abbr.length() > word.length()) return false;\n        int i = 0, j = 0;\n        for (; i < abbr.length(); i++) {\n            int digit = 0;\n            if (Character.isDigit(abbr.charAt(i))) {\n                while (i < abbr.length() && Character.isDigit(abbr.charAt(i))) {\n                    digit = digit * 10 + (abbr.charAt(i) - '0');\n                    if (digit == 0) return false;\n                    i++;\n                }\n                i--;\n                j += digit;\n                if (j > word.length()) return false;\n            } else if (abbr.charAt(i) == word.charAt(j)) {\n                j++;\n            } else return false;\n        }\n        return j == word.length();\n    }\n}","compare_result":"","title_slug":"valid-word-abbreviation"}
